title: Hitch Hike - P.F Campanile 1977 / DVDR
description:
Hitch Hike (Autostop Rosso Sangue) - Pasquale Festa Campanile 1977 (Italy) <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0077188/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0077188/</a>

 
While on a cross-country drive, a bitter writer (Franco Nero) and his beautiful wife (Corinne Clery) pick up a stranded motorist (Mr Terror - David Hess of The Last House on the Left, House in the edge of the park...). 
But when this hitcher turns out to be a depraved psychopath, their road trip takes a vicious detour into sex and savagery...

Co-writer/director Pasquale Festa Campanile (director of When Women Had Tails) packs this outstanding sleaze epic with wild performances, extreme violence and some nasty surprises, all set to a remarkable score by Ennio Morricone 

Picture: 1.85:1 WS
Sound: English (no subs)
Format: NTSC
Extras:
# The Devil thumbs a ride - All new interviews with Hess & Nero
# Trailer

Encoded with DVD-Shrink.
